field.name: USBVSTBY
field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during VLPR and VLPW modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during VLPR and VLPW modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during VLPR and VLPW modes

field.name: USBSSTBY
field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes

field.name: URWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator enable write enable

field.name: UVSWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator VLP standby write enable

field.name: USSWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator stop standby write enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 1 Hz clock is output on the RTC_CLKOUT pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 32.768kHz clock is output on the RTC_CLKOUT pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the FlexBus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the FlexBus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip instruction accesses are disallowed. Data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip instruction accesses and data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Double pad drive strength for PTD7

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: MCGPLLCLK/MCGFLLCLK clock divided by the USB fractional divider. See the SIM_CLKDIV2[USBFRAC, USBDIV] descriptions

field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
field.description: FTM1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 0 input capture source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLK0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLK1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: HSCMP0 output drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB output trigger 1 drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Alternate trigger selected for ADC1 as defined by ADC1TRGSEL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: 128 KB of program flash, 4 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: 256 KB of program flash, 8 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1011
enumeratedValue.description: 512 KB of program flash, 16 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: 128 KB of FlexNVM, 32 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: 256 KB of FlexNVM, 32 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Physical flash block 1 is used as FlexNVM Reserved for devices without FlexNVM

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Physical flash block 1 is used as program flash
